text: Ida ma, marlulu ma ahu, ninna Jahowa dompak angka na manurirangkon nipi sipaotooto, angka na hinatahonnasida laho mangaliluhon bangsongku marhitehite sipaotootonasida dohot marhitehite panengaonnasida. Hape ndang dung ahu marsuru nasida, jala ndang dung ahu martona tu nasida, jala ndang marguna nasida di bangso on ninna Jahowa.
